Journal.Title: Advances in rehabilitation science and practice

Article.ArticleTitle: A New Professional Society for Post-COVID Condition and Other Post-Viral Conditions.

MedlineCitation.CoiStatement: The author(s) declared no potential conflicts of interest with respect to the research, authorship, and/or publication of this article. Manoj Sivan serves on the Editorial Board of the journal.
